item.title: Blogdown test post
item.description: Intro Basic features Maths R chuncks Citations etc Misc Images Interactive stuff References Edited: 2022-06-16 19:54:03 Intro To begin posting interesting statistics tidbits and personal notes online, I first needed to find a suitable workflow to make the publication process as easy as possible. Since I work most days using R with Rstudio, this blogdown-generated site format might just do. Letâ€™s play with it a bit a see what it can do.
